describe: Rwanda, known as the 'Land of a Thousand Hills', is a landlocked country in East-Central Africa. It is renowned for its breathtaking landscapes, rich culture, and vibrant wildlife, including the famous mountain gorillas in Volcanoes National Park.

cities.name: üèô Kigali
cities.climate: Kigali has a tropical savanna climate with a pronounced dry season. The city enjoys moderate temperatures throughout the year.

cities.name: üå≥ Musanze
cities.climate: Musanze has a temperate climate due to its elevation, with cooler temperatures and significant rainfall.
popular_attractions: Twin Lakes of Burera and Ruhondo

cities.name: üåÜ Huye
cities.climate: Huye experiences a tropical climate with a wet and dry season, and it is generally cooler due to its elevation.
cities.famous_cuisine: Isombe, Ikivuguto (fermented milk), and Ibihaza (pumpkin stew)
